lines.text: You can take that to the bank!
I'm gonna take you to the bank, Senator Trent. To the blood bank!
This is for my wife. Fuck you and die!
[Storm fires a shot between the Senator's legs]
I missed! I never miss! They must have been smaller than I thought!

How do you like this, Vernon? I'd like to kill you so bad I can barely contain myself. But I've been thinking. Death is far too merciful a fate for you. So what I'm going to do is... put you in prison. A nice petite white boy like you in a federal penitentiary... Let me just put it this way, I don't think you'll be able to remain anal-retentive for very long.
[Storm has just killed Capt. Hulland]
Now you're a good cop.
So, how come you're not watching the Oscars tonight?
The Oscars?
Yeah, the Oscars.
I hate the Oscars.
You're not having a good time, huh?
I mean, who needs the goddamn movies anyway? I got a show in here every single night.
Yeah?
You've got horror, sex, freaks, violence. I don't got to pay no four bucks either.

[to the comatose Mason Storm]
Would you like a little pussy?
[she places a kitten on his bed]
[the convenience store counterman is being robbed at gunpoint]

[to Mason]
Where's a goddamn cop when you need one?
If people knew how sweet you are, they'd never be scared of you... I'm not scared of you.
Maybe you should be.
There's blood on your shirt.
It's not my blood, so you don't have to worry, do you?
[the owner of Mason Storm's former house enters a room where Storm has caused a mess]
I'm sorry, but your contractor's doing a lousy job.
[a shotgun is pointed at Mason Storm]
What are you grinning at, huh?
Well, you know... there's only four of you guys, and... you only have one shot left in here. You know?
I'm gonna cut your fucking heart out!
Yeah? Well, come and cut my heart out, okay? Come and cut my heart out!
[Mason and Andy are packing up]
Where are we going?
Out of here.
[a knife-wielding punk wants to cut Mason, but Mason is holding a shotgun]
Oh, I know what you're thinking. Mine's bigger than yours, right? It's not fair.

[to Capt. Hulland]
How does it feel to know you're about to die?
[O'Malley and Hulland mistakenly believe that Mason Storm is dead]
That was the most unstoppable son of a bitch I ever knew.
Yeah, well... he got stopped tonight.
[Kevin O'Malley and Sonny Storm encounter Nolan and Quentero at the train station]
What are you doing, you taking a trip somewhere?

[pretends that Sonny is his son]
Yeah... yeah, me and my kid are visiting my mother in New Mexico.
Oh, that's your son, huh? It's funny, you know he doesn't look much like you. Does he, Quentero? As a matter of fact, I think that I've seen his ugly face before.
Kind of looks like Mason Storm.
Yeah.

[eyeing the shot-up Jeep Storm's driving]
How hot is it, homes?
Smokin'
You got it!
[they switch vehicles]
We're outgunned, and undermanned. But you know sumpin'? We're gonna win. You know why? Superior attitude. Superior state of mind.
Who are you?
My name is Danny. I'm the physical therapist. I'm going to give you a massage, take you down the hall, and make you feel all right, okay?
Get the fuck out of here.
Okay, don't worry about anything. I'm just going to take you down the hall.
Who... who are you?
That's a very long story. You got a few minutes?
You give me this beard.
Yeah.
[both start laughing]
Well, you tried.
[Mason starts laughing and Andy looks at him]
You ever been to China town.
Yeah, why?
These are just some needles and herbs for my recovery.
Wow, how did you learn to write in Chinese.
Well, when I was kid. My father was a missionary. I spent the first 10 years of my life in China. There, I learned how to fight as you could imagine. I remember going to my martial arts teacher.
[he imitiates the teacher]

He said, "Why you come to me" and I say, "Ah, to learn how to fight." And he's like, "Oh, so you wanna hurt people, but you wanna be great." I say, "Yeah, I wanna be great. "Then first learn how to heal people to be great, to hurt people is easy."
[both looking at each other]
[Posing as a doctor, Axel searches for Storm in the hospital]
Excuse me, doctor?
Yes?
I have to check every one of these upper floors.
Of course.
Can I just get your ID please?
You know, you can't have too much security.

[to a detective]
You know how they said Storm was superhuman. You know why? He was jacked up on coke the whole time.
[O'Malley overhears Hulland, and angrily confronts him]

Let me tell you something. That was the cleanest man I ever knew. He had more honor and guts than this whole department put together. If I ever hear you talk that puke again, I'll lose my shield to put you where you belong.
Sweet dreams.
[kills Felicia Storm]

Let me tell you something, Sonny... one day when this is all over, you, me, and your pop are going to rent us a fishing boat, and catch us the biggest fish that ever swam the seas. And I'm not talking goldfish, either.
The last time I went fishing with Pop, we caught an old tire.

[laughs]
Not this time, Sonny. We're going to get us a big fat tuna.
What year is it?
Try not to talk.
What year is it?
[Danny sees Russ lying on the floor]
Russ! Russ! What happened? Doc?
He's dead.
[Storm has just attacked some of Trent's cohorts]

[sarcastically]
I'm impressed.

[Mason has a gun drawn, and is looking for Senator Trent]
Oh Vernon?... Come on out Vernon... No, You're not under the bed... You're so good at this Vernon.

[to Mason]
Tell you what... How about I get you a piece of lemon chiffon pie out of the refrigerator later?

[pointing a gun at the thugs in the pool room]
How's the action boys? Mind if I play? I know what you're thinking. If I have this in my hand that I can't play. How's this? Gonna put it away
[puts away gun]
. Well, somebody hand me a cue.
[Mason and Andy flee the house they were staying at]
Oh, I forgot to lock the door.
